attributes.action: Allow zoos to open on the 15th June if they have implemented social distancing.
attributes.additional_details: Let all zoos reopen on the 15th June 2020 along with non essential businesses if they have implemented social distancing or offer financial if they are not allowed too. Help save our zoos and conservation efforts.
attributes.background: Chester Zoo have been told by the government that they are not able to open as they were expecting to. Having meticulously planned their social distancing measures throughout, and having a huge outdoor site with all the necessary safety measures in place they are financially struggling.

rejection.details:
